markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To change opacity of mui typography in React js, you can use this code sx={{ opacity: 0.5 }}. It will change opacity of mui typography in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to change opacity of mui typography in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Change opacity of mui typography Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';

Step 3: Change opacity of mui typography Component.

You can use the Typography component in your react js. For example, The typography component is used to create text. and opacity CSS property set to 0.5.

<Typography variant="h1" sx={{ opacity: 0.5 }}>
    Hello World, this is a text with reduced opacity.
</Typography>

MUI material change opacity of mui typography example.

The below code is an example, to change opacity in Typography, you need to import Typography Component. You can use inline css style sx={{ opacity: 0.5 }} and it will change opacity on text.

App.js

import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Typography variant="h1" sx={{ opacity: 0.5 }}>
      Hello World, this is a text with reduced opacity.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and changed opacity of mui typography in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.

Here, we are provided code sandbox links for the above program change opacity of mui typography in react js. Then you can use whenever you want and do the changes as per your requirements.
